channel.title: Our Services on Providence Healthtech
channel.description: Recent content in Our Services on Providence Healthtech

item.title: Advisory Services
item.description: Lifecyle management of your healthcare IT projects including EMR migration, clinical efficiency audits, and technology-based revenue promotion.

item.title: OpenEMR Expertise
item.description: Providence is a leader in the OpenEMR community - a practical solution for solo and small practices with a small IT budget.

item.title: Global Health
item.description: Providence Healthtech’s philanthropic grant program offering low-to-no cost EMR solutions for developing health markets.
